Grain.Do: Barley (1/2 cup cooked), Millet (1/2 cup cooked), Quinoa (1/2 cup cooked). These are light and drying, balancing Kapha.
Grain.Dont: Refined grains like white rice and white bread. Heavy grains like oats (unless cooked very dry and spiced).

Legume.Do: Lentils (red, yellow, split peas) (1/2 cup cooked), Mung beans (1/2 cup cooked). Light, easy to digest.
Legume.Dont: Heavy beans like kidney beans, chickpeas (in larger quantities), black beans. Soaking and cooking with spices like asafoetida is crucial.

Veg.Do: Asparagus (1 cup cooked), Broccoli (1 cup cooked), Cauliflower (1 cup cooked), Green beans (1 cup cooked), Bitter Gourd (1/2 cup cooked). All are Kapha-reducing, bitter, and astringent.
Veg.Dont: Root vegetables like potatoes, sweet potatoes, yams (in large amounts). Tomatoes, cucumbers (especially cold). These increase Kapha.

Spices.Do: Ginger (1/2 inch fresh or 1/4 tsp dry), Turmeric (1/4 tsp), Cumin (1/4 tsp), Coriander (1/4 tsp), Black Pepper (pinch), Cinnamon (pinch). Warming and digestive.
Spices.Dont: Heavy, sweet spices like nutmeg (in excess). Overuse of salt. Spices that are too cooling.

Leafy veg.Do: Spinach (1 cup cooked), Kale (1 cup cooked), Fenugreek leaves (1 cup cooked). Cooked and spiced are best.
Leafy veg.Dont: Raw leafy greens in large quantities. Watery greens like lettuce (unless spiced).

Oil.Do: Ghee (1 tsp), Mustard Oil (1 tsp), Sesame Oil (1 tsp). Use sparingly.
Oil.Dont: Heavy oils like coconut oil. Excessive amounts of any oil.

Fruits.Do: Apples (1 small, cooked), Pears (1 small, cooked), Berries (1/2 cup), Pomegranate (1/2 cup). Lighter, astringent fruits are preferred.
Fruits.Dont: Sweet, heavy, and watery fruits like bananas, avocados, mangoes, melons. Cold fruits.

Nuts and Dry fruits.Do: Almonds (soaked and peeled, 5-7), Walnuts (2-3). Consume in moderation.
Nuts and Dry fruits.Dont: Cashews, pistachios, macadamia nuts. Dried fruits like dates and raisins (in excess).

Milk product.Do: Buttermilk (1 cup, spiced with cumin and ginger), Small amounts of goat's milk yogurt (1/4 cup).
Milk product.Dont: Full-fat milk, cheese, ice cream, heavy yogurt. These are Kapha-aggravating.

Condiments.Do: Lemon juice (1 tsp), Ginger-mint chutney (1 tbsp), Spiced vinegar (1 tsp).
Condiments.Dont: Heavy, sweet chutneys. Salted butter. Fermented foods in excess.
